about_the_game:
❗WARNING!❗ Game contains topics and references to mental health and suicide. Players discretion is advised.

Broken Psyche is an episodic horror series unraveling the mystery of your wife's disappearance. Explore the eerie asylum, solve challenging puzzles, and survive the lurking horrors from the monster within while maintaining your sanity.

Uncover horrific scenes and tackle the frightening environment to learn about The Asylum your wife went missing researching. The Asylum is uncovered in secrets, where decisions here can permanently effect your playthrough. Broken Psyche rewards explorations, so don't be shy to explore! Solve puzzles, fight back against the crazy people who occupy here, manage your stress, and find your wife. Each episode contains new monsters, puzzles, and more deep lore into the dark stories of Broken Psyche.

Managing your stress in Broken Psyche is one of the most important aspects of your journey. Delve too deep into madness, and your mission to solve the secrets of The Asylum will be vastly more difficult. Decisions you make could permanently scar or heal your character, so be wary. Pick me ups like cigarettes can be a life saver here, completely destressing any situation.

          

Delve too far into the spiral on insanity and pay the consequences. In Broken Psyche you're battling more than monsters. You're in an eternal war with your own sanity. It's important not to make mistakes and take a logical approach to the situations you will find yourself in.

Yes, there is an economy in Broken Psyche. Money runs the world, and even more so in The Asylum. Scavenge and obtain money from any means necessary to trade in valuable materials with The Shopkeeper. Key items, cigarettes, food, and bonus content can all be obtained through him. Whether you  find money on a poor deceased soul or in a hidden compartment somewhere, you're always rewarded for exploring and checking in corners some may not look themselves.

There are many secrets hidden in the world of Broken Psyche. A lot of the lore and meanings of The Asylum can be found with subtle clues and notes scattered around. Each note with a new face is accompanied by a person kidnapped to The Asylum, and they have a chilling story to tell. With clues to be seen about your wife's disappearance, you will need more than the capability to read to figure out where she has gone.

content_descriptors.notes: Broken Psyche contains references to topics such as suicide, trauma and gore which may be too much for sensitive players.

name: Broken Psyche

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 280
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600K or AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 Super or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • Storage: 900 MB available space

short_description: Play as a detective investigating his wife's disappearance. Suspecting the asylum she was researching, he infiltrates it, only to uncover a realm of horror. Solve puzzles, maintain sanity, and confront monsters as you unravel the asylum's secrets.
